hero.title: Our Academic Programs
hero.subtitle: Excellence in Islamic and Secular Education

nurseryProgram.title: Nursery Section
nurseryProgram.description: Early childhood is a critical period for development. Our Nursery section provides a nurturing, play-based learning environment that balances Islamic values with foundational academic skills.
focus: Introduction to Islamic values and daily practices

primaryProgram.title: Primary Section
primaryProgram.description: Our Primary section provides comprehensive education integrating Islamic theology with rigorous secular academics. Students develop intellectually, spiritually, and morally.

islamicStudies.title: Islamic Studies
islamicStudies.description: At the heart of our curriculum is Islamic education. We teach students to understand Islam deeply and live its values authentically.

components.name: Quranic Studies
components.description: Comprehensive study of the Quran with proper recitation (Tajweed) and understanding (Tafseer)

components.name: Hadith Studies
components.description: Study of the Prophet Muhammad's (peace be upon him) sayings and practices

components.name: Islamic Jurisprudence (Fiqh)
components.description: Understanding Islamic rulings on daily life, worship, and conduct

components.name: Islamic Creed (Aqeedah)
components.description: Foundation of Islamic beliefs and understanding of Allah's oneness

components.name: Islamic History and Civilization
components.description: Learning from the rich heritage of Islamic civilization

quranMemorisation.title: Quran Memorisation (Hifz Program)
quranMemorisation.description: For students with dedication and aptitude, we offer a structured Hifz program to memorise the entire Quran under expert guidance.
quranMemorisation.program: Students in the Hifz program receive specialized instruction alongside their regular academics. They benefit from qualified instructors and a supportive learning community.

secularCurriculum.title: Secular Academic Curriculum
secularCurriculum.description: We maintain rigorous academic standards aligned with Ugandan national curriculum while exceeding expectations in student achievement.

subjects.name: Sciences
subjects.description: Biology, Chemistry, Physics - understanding the natural world

subjects.name: Computer Studies
subjects.description: Digital literacy and technology skills for the 21st century

teachingMethodology.title: Our Teaching Approach
teachingMethodology.description: We employ modern, evidence-based teaching methods that engage students and promote deep learning.

approaches.title: Student-Centered Learning
approaches.description: Students are active participants, not passive recipients. We encourage questions, exploration, and critical thinking.

approaches.title: Differentiation
approaches.description: We recognize that each student learns differently. Teachers adapt instruction to meet individual needs.

approaches.title: Collaborative Learning
approaches.description: Students work together, learning cooperation and developing social skills.

approaches.title: Assessment for Learning
approaches.description: Regular assessment informs instruction and helps students understand their progress.

approaches.title: Integration
approaches.description: Islamic values are woven throughout the curriculum, not taught in isolation.

facilities.name: Modern Classrooms
facilities.description: Interactive learning spaces equipped with interactive boards and modern technology

facilities.name: Library & Resource Center
facilities.description: Well-stocked library with extensive educational resources and research materials

facilities.name: Computer Lab
facilities.description: Fully equipped computer lab with internet connectivity and modern hardware

facilities.name: Islamic Learning Spaces
facilities.description: Dedicated spaces for Islamic studies, prayer, and spiritual development

facilities.name: Science Laboratories
facilities.description: Fully equipped science labs for Biology, Chemistry, and Physics experiments

facilities.name: Sports & Recreation
facilities.description: Comprehensive sports facilities including football pitch, courts, and athletics track

facilities.name: Outdoor Play Areas
facilities.description: Secure, age-appropriate outdoor spaces for recreation and play

extracurricular.title: Enrichment Activities
extracurricular.description: Beyond academics, we offer diverse activities nurturing talents and building character.
activities: Islamic clubs and Quran recitation groups
